scripts.clean: npm run clean:results && npm run clean:modules
scripts.sorry:cy:run:local: cross-env CURRENTS_API_URL='http://localhost:1234' cypress-cloud run --record --key secret_key --parallel --ci-build-id build-001
scripts.sorry:cy:run:minikube: cross-env CURRENTS_API_URL='http://kube.local:1234' cypress-cloud run --record --key secret_key --parallel --ci-build-id build-001
scripts.docker:run:chrome: docker run -d --network e2e-tests -e CURRENTS_API_URL=http://director:1234 e2e:latest sh -c "npx cypress-cloud run --env ENV=prod --browser chrome --record --key secret_key --parallel --ci-build-id chrome_docker_$(date +%Y-%m-%d)"
